instruction: Compose a song that tells a story
output:
Verse 1:
Yesterday I was lost, searching for a meaning in this mess 
I'd forgotten who I was, hoping to find a bit of happiness 
But I stumbled on a dream, one that could show me a different way 
One that could relieve my pain, one that could make me laugh and play 

Chorus: 
Oh, this is the answer I've been waiting for 
Now I know who I am and I'm no longer afraid of what's in store 
A journey, a destination, never far apart 
Take a look at today, 'cause I know I'll never be lost in the dark

Verse 2:
Every night I keep walking, down the same path, I know so well 
I continue to stumble, but my dreams give me the strength to keep going 
The darkness of the night, threatens to make all hope fade away 
But I keep pushing forward, and my courage only grows with each passing day 

Chorus: 
Oh, this is the answer I've been waiting for 
Now I know who I am and I'm no longer afraid of what's in store 
A journey, a destination, never far apart 
Take a look at today, 'cause I know I'll never be lost in the dark

Bridge:
When the night beckons, I have no fear 
My heart still pounds, my courage still stands strong 
The road reveals a new destination 
I won't be lost and I won't get tired of traveling on

Chorus: 
Oh, this is the answer I've been waiting for 
Now I know who I am and I'm no longer afraid of what's in store 
A journey, a destination, never far apart 
Take a look at today, 'cause I know I'll never be lost in the dark
